mapper.select: select count(*) from MAC_MACHINE where FK_POLICEOFFICE_ID = #{id}
select count(*) from MAC_MACHINE where FK_POLICEOFFICE_ID = #{id} AND STATUS = "00"
select count(*) from MAC_MACHINE where FK_POLICEOFFICE_ID = #{id} AND STATUS = "01"

select sum(MAC_COUNT) from RECORD_PER_DAY_STATISTICS
COMPRESSION = 0
AND RECORD_DATE = str_to_date(#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND MAC_MACHINE_NO = #{macNo}

select RECORD_DATE as date, COALESCE(SUM(MAC_COUNT),0) as count from RECORD_PER_DAY_STATISTICS
RECORD_DATE >= #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND RECORD_DATE <= #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND COMPRESSION = 0
GROUP BY RECORD_DATE

E_LE_ME_MOBILE = #{eLeMeMobile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YI_XIN = #{yiXin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAI_WANG = #{laiWang,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MO_MO = #{moMo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WEI_XIN_MOBILE = #{weiXinMobile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WEI_PIN_HUI_MOBILE = #{weiPinHuiMobile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QQ_KONG_JIAN_MOBILE = #{qqKongJianMobile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DANG_DANG_MOBILE = #{dangDangMobile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YI_HAO_DIAN_MOBILE = #{yiHaoDianMobile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAIL_139_MOBILE = #{mail139Mobile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZHI_FU_BAO_MOBILE = #{zhiFuBaoMobile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DING_DING_MOBILE = #{dingDingMobile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOU_TIAO_MOBILE = #{touTiaoMobile,jdbcType=INTEGER} where RECORD_DATE = #{recordDate,jdbcType=DATE} and MAC_MACHINE_NO = #{macMachineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and COMPRESSION = #{compression,jdbcType=BIT}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(QQ_CHAT) as qqChat, SUM(SINA_WEI_BO) as sinaWeiBo, SUM(WEI_XIN_MOBILE) as weiXinMobile, SUM(VI_COUNT) as viCount FROM RECORD_PER_DAY_STATISTICS WHERE COMPRESSION = 1
